trans-unit.source: Hosts a portable, high fidelity, fixed-format document with read access for user text selection, keyboard navigation, and search.
trans-unit.target: 裝載可攜式、 高精確度的固定格式文件具有使用者文字選取範圍、 鍵盤巡覽和搜尋的讀取存取權。

trans-unit.source: FixedDocument logically binds an ordered sequence of pages together into a single, multi-page, fixed-layout document.
trans-unit.target: FixedDocument 以邏輯方式將繫結的分頁已排序的順序一起成單一多頁，修正配置文件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> is the only allowable child element of the FixedDocument element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>是 FixedDocument 項目的唯一允許的子項目。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> element refers to the source of the content for a single page.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>項目參考的單一頁面內容的來源。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent> elements must be in sequential markup order, matching the page order of the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>項目必須是連續的標記順序，比對文件的頁面順序。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.PageContent>

trans-unit.source: FixedDocument is designed for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wys](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wys-md.md)] applications where the document layout is defined and controlled by the application for rendering to the highest accuracy of the display or print device.
trans-unit.target: FixedDocument 適合[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wys](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wys-md.md)]其中文件版面配置是定義，而最高精確度的轉譯的顯示或列印裝置的應用程式所控制的應用程式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>, on the other hand, is designed to maximize user readability, and dynamically adjusts the document layout based on user preferences (for example, a user-chosen type size or font) and other variables, such as display size and resolution.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>相反地，設計來最大化使用者可讀性和動態調整文件版面配置，根據使用者喜好設定 （例如，使用者所選類型的大小或字型） 和其他變數，例如顯示大小和解析度。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the paginator for the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> that provides page-oriented services such as getting a particular page and repaginating in response to changes.
trans-unit.target: 取得針對分頁符號<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref>提供網頁導向的服務，例如取得特定的頁面上，並重新編頁以回應變更。

trans-unit.source: If you need a paginator with automatic repagination in responses to changes, such as adding content to the document, derive a class from <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator> which itself inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要變更，例如新增回應中的自動重新編頁與分頁符號在文件內容，請從<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator>本身繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator></xref:System.Windows.Documents.DynamicDocumentPaginator>衍生類別

trans-unit.source: An object of a class derived from <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref> that provides pagination services.
trans-unit.target: 物件的類別衍生自<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.DocumentPaginator"></xref>提供分頁服務。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for accessing the document's <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref> child elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得列舉值來存取文件的<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>子項目。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator for accessing the document's <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref> child elements.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取文件的列舉值<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>子項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an automation peer for the document.
trans-unit.target: 建立文件的自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"></xref> that exposes the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"></xref> to Microsoft UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentAutomationPeer"> </xref>公開<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument"> </xref> Microsoft UI 自動化。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the document's <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 取得文件的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: A collection of the document's <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: 文件的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Documents.PageContent"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> that is associated with this document.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref>與這份文件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> contains printing information such as whether to print on both sides of each sheet.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>包含列印的資訊，例如是否將每個工作表雙面列印。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: Setting this PrintTicket property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個 PrintTicket 屬性不會驗證或修改指定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>.</xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>

trans-unit.source: If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要使用<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-特定<xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket>這是適用於給定的印表機。</xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue> </xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"></xref> for this document.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Printing.PrintTicket"> </xref>這份文件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument.PrintTicket*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument.PrintTicket*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument.PrintTicket*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the service object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之型別的服務物件。

trans-unit.source: An object that specifies the type of service object to get.
trans-unit.target: 物件，指定要取得之服務物件類型。

trans-unit.source: A service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: 型別的服務物件 serviceType 。

trans-unit.source: -or- if there is no service object of type serviceType.
trans-unit.target: - 型別的服務物件是否 serviceType 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a child object.
trans-unit.target: 加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: The child object to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入子物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds the text content of a node to the object.
trans-unit.target: 將節點的文字內容加入物件中。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: 要新增至物件的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the current application context.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的應用程式內容的基底 URI。

trans-unit.source: The base URI of the application context.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式內容的基底 URI。
